title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 227-2.3 - Application and permitting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 227-2.3 - Application and permitting requirements

State Regulations
(a) Every facility
containing an emission source subject to this Subpart must have or obtain a
permit pursuant to Subpart 201-6 of this Title. (b) Case-by-case RACT determinations made in
accordance with the requirements of this Subpart will be recorded in the
facility permit, pursuant to Subpart 201-6 of this Title, as applicable
NO
x
RACT limitations, and must be submitted to the
administrator for approval as a separate SIP revision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
227-2.3

Amended

New

York State Register November 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 48, eff. 12/7/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
